# Death Hail (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Cold Spells|cold]], [[Death Spells|death]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[Winter (Domain)|Winter 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** Cylinder (40-ft radius, 20 ft. high)

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 92

You call into being an intense storm of death hail in the area you designate. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Fortitude save or take 1d2 points of Strength and Constitution damage.
